data.title: James Cruze
data.text:
AKA Jens Vera Cruz Bosen

Born: 27-Mar-1884

Birthplace: Ogden, UT

Died: 3-Aug-1942

Location of death: Los Angeles, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Cremated, Hollywood Forever Cemetery, Hollywood, CA

Gender: Male

Religion: Mormon

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director, Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: If I Had a Million

Wife: Marguerite Snow (actress, m. 1913, div. 1923)

Wife: Betty Compson (actress, m. 25-Oct-1925, div. 20-May-1930)

Wife: Alberta Beatrice McCoy (m. 30-Jun-1941, until his death)

Hollywood Walk of Fame 6920 Hollywood Blvd. (motion pictures)

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

The Wrong Road (11-Oct-1937)

David Harum (1-Mar-1934)

Mr. Skitch (22-Dec-1933)

I Cover the Waterfront (19-May-1933)

If I Had a Million (2-Dec-1932)

Washington Merry-Go-Round (15-Oct-1932)

The Great Gabbo (12-Sep-1929)

The Mating Call (21-Jul-1928)

Old Ironsides (6-Dec-1926)

The Pony Express (4-Sep-1925)

Ruggles of Red Gap (9-Sep-1923)

The Covered Wagon (16-Mar-1923)

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
